name: CreepyFactoids
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: say something creepy
des: Lean in close or turn your volume up. Alexa has something she wants to tell you. With almost 300 oddball facts scraped from the Internet, Alexa will attempt to creep you out with her hushed voice (or not).
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
